note.p: Birth: Cromer Hall, Norfolk, England (26 February 1841)

Career: Entered Royal Artillery (1858); Commissioner of Egyptian public debt (1877-1879); retired with the rank of Major (1878); Agent and Consul General, Egypt (1883-1907); Minister Plenipotentiary, Diplomatic Service (1883-1907)
Honours: OM; GCB; CIE 1876; KCSI 1883; CB 1885; KCB 1887; GCMG 1888; Baron 1892; Viscount 1898; Earl 1901
